effect_entries.effect: Teaches Defog to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. (HS: Whirlpool DPP: Defog Gen III & II & I: Flash)

flavor_text_entries.text:
すごい　勢いで　相手に　つっこみ
攻撃する。流れ落ちる　滝も
泳いで　のぼれる。

The user charges at the target and may make it
flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

Carica il nemico a grande velocità e può farlo
tentennare.
Fuori dalla lotta fa risalire le cascate.

Dispositivo que busca Entrenadores listos para el
combate. La batería se carga mientras caminas.

Eine mächtige Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell
zurückschrecken lässt. Sie macht Wasserfälle
bezwingbar.

Le lanceur charge l’ennemi à une vitesse
remarquable. Permet aussi de franchir une
cascade.

폭포를 거꾸로 오르는 듯한
엄청난 기세로 돌진하여 공격한다.
폭포를 오를 수도 있다.

たきを　さかのぼるような　すさまじい
いきおいで　とっしん　こうげきする。
たきを　のぼることも　できる。

The user charges the target at an
awesome speed. It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

The user charges the target at an
awesome speed. It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

Le lanceur charge l’ennemi à une
vitesse remarquable. Permet aussi
de franchir une cascade.

Traps foes in a violent swirling
whirlpool. It can also be used to
traverse whirlpools.

Obstacles are moved, reducing the
foe’s evasion stat. It can also be
used to clear deep fog.

Obstacles are moved, reducing the
foe’s evasion stat. It can also be
used to clear deep fog.

A blast of light
that cuts the foe’s
accuracy. It also
illuminates caves.

Looses a powerful
blast of light that
reduces accuracy.

Looses a powerful
blast of light that
reduces accuracy.
